titleInfo.title: Brought to the Second Municipality Police Prison.

mods.abstract: BROUGHT to the Second Municipality Police Prison--MACK, a light griff, 5 feet 7 inches high, aged about 30 years; says he belongs to Capt. Crump. WILLIAM, a dark griff, 5 feet 8 inches high, aged about 32 years; says he belongs to Mr. Villere, three miles from the English Turn. JANE or JULIA, a black, 4 feet 10 inches high, aged about 13 years; says she belongs to Mr. Smith. The owners are requested to conform with law in regard to them. H.J. WILLIAMS, Warden. New Orleans, February 5, 1851. fe12 1taw3w

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
